I absolutely love these earrings! I have been wanting to get hoop earrings of different sizes for a while. These are exactly what I had in mind.  These earrings arrived nicely packaged individually in a leather like pouch. The sizes are just right for me. I didn't want anything big. They appear to be well made, they feel strong and durable. They seem to be stainless steel as indicated since my very sensitive ears didn't have any issues. I like the bullet style backs, they are very secure. These earrings are lightweight, so they are easy to wear all the time. I even sleep with them in and don't have any problems. I think the price is excellent considering the quality and the quantity of earrings. I am glad I ordered this set!  I don't yet know how well they will hold up over time, since I just received them, but I don't anticipate any problems. I will update this review if I obtain more insightful information in the future.

These gold hoop earrings were perfect for me as now I have an allergy to metals and nickel, but I wanted to keep my holes open. I ordered the silver hoop earrings. They come in a package of 5 different sizes. Each pair is packaged in a small plastic bag and all the bags in a leather pouch. They are quite sturdy. The backs fit on well so they are secure. The color of the earrings is a little off to my eye, just a shade darker so they look more like stainless steel than silver, but they’re fine either way.
my wife likes them but wishes they had a higher shiner finish

These earrings come in individually packaged and with a pouch to store them or to give them as a gift. The metal feels high quality. Great options if you don’t know what size hoop is best or if you want to wear multiple hoops at one time. Great value for the cost.

The earrings are sturdy and made of quality material. They are comfortable to wear and are a nice smaller hoop that hugs your earlobe and secures tightly in the back with a straight post. This is important for me because my ears seem to be sensitive to the hoops that have curved posts. I love the variety across the 5 pairs- ranging in sizes for great everyday wear. 5-star rating for overall quality and stylish look.
